comment: /**  * Process any errors which may have occurred during validation  *  * @param exchange the exchange  * @param schema   the schema  * @param errors   the validation errors  * @throws ValidationException is thrown in case of validation errors  */
code: /**  * Process any errors which may have occurred during validation  *  * @param exchange the exchange  * @param schema   the schema  * @param errors   the validation errors  * @throws ValidationException is thrown in case of validation errors  */ void handleErrors(Exchange exchange, JsonSchema schema, Set<ValidationMessage> errors) throws ValidationException.

comment: /**  * Process a general error that happens during valdating  *  * @param exchange the exchange  * @param schema   the schema  * @param e        general error  * @throws ValidationException is thrown in case of validation errors  */
code: /**  * Process a general error that happens during valdating  *  * @param exchange the exchange  * @param schema   the schema  * @param e        general error  * @throws ValidationException is thrown in case of validation errors  */ void handleErrors(Exchange exchange, JsonSchema schema, Exception e) throws ValidationException.
